verses.roman:
śuni, śivānanda sena tāṅhā śīghra āila
namaskāra kari' tāṅra nikaṭe vasila

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; śivānanda sena—of the name Śivānanda Sena; tāṅhā—there; śīghra—quickly; āila—came; namaskāra kari'-offering obeisances; tāṅra nikaṭe—near him; vasila—sat down.
translation: Hearing these calls, Śivānanda Sena quickly went there, offered obeisances to Nakula Brahmacārī, and sat down near him.
